title: MWA-NY Holiday Revels with Guest of Honor Lee Child
desc: Join us for our annual holiday party with Guest of Honor  Lee Child.  Come enjoy cocktails, hors d oeuvres, and dessert, and take home an MWA-NY gift bag full of books and goodies. Lee Child is the #1 internationally bestselling author of the Jack Reacher thrillers. His debut,  Killing Floor,  won both the Anthony and the Barry awards for Best First Mystery, and  The Enemy  won both the Barry and the Nero awards for Best Novel. Child, a native of England and a former television director, lives in New York City and the south of France with his wife and daughter.
